name: Chronojet Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC)[Generation Break 2](This ability is active if you have two or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):When this unit attacks a vanguard, until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and your opponent cannot call grade 1 or greater units from hand to (GC).[AUTO](VC):[Counter-Blast 1] During your turn, when your G unit [Stride], you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and your opponent puts that unit on the bottom of his or her deck.
